lines.text: If this were the army I'd have you shot at sunrise!
But you couldn't do that, cap, we don't get up that early!
Hey, did you hear a bell?
I said "Did you hear a bell?"
I can't hear you on account of the bell.
I guess the only way I can get a man to come to see me is to call a doctor.
Is there any gas in the tank?
The arrow's half-way. I don't know if it's half empty or half full!
